rukus.text: 15|45|Hontōni omo o osoreru mono wa, izumi no aru rakuen ni hairu.
15|46|(Kare-ra wa aisatsu sa reyou. ) `Anata gata wa, heian ni kokoro yasuraka ni koko ni o-iri.'
15|47|Ware wa kare-ra no mune ni aru kakawari o nozoki,(kare-ra wa) kyōdai to shite kōi no neisu no ue ni taiza suru.
15|48|Sokode wa tsukare aki koto naku, mata (eien ni) soko kara owa reru koto mo nai.
15|49|Ware no shimo be-tachi ni,`ware wa hontōni, kan'yōde jihibukai monodeari,
15|50|ware no chōbatsu wa, hontōni tsūkuna chōbatsudearu.' To tsuge shirase nasai.
15|51|Sore kara, iburāhīmu no hinkyaku no koto ni tsuite kare-ra ni katare.
15|52|Kare-ra (hinkyaku no 2 tenshi) ga, kare no tokoro ni haitte kite,`heian'are.' To aisatsu shita toki,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gataga, kowaidesu.' To itta.
15|53|Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Watashi-tachi wa rikōna 1-ri no musuko ga 授Ru kippō o, anata ni motarashita noda.'
15|54|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa sudeni rōrei ni tasshite iru no ni, anata gata wa watashi ni kippō o kudasaru no ka. Ittai anata gata ni nani no kippō ga arou ka.'
15|55|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, shinri ni yotte kippō o anata ni tsutaeru. Dakara shitsubō shite wa naranai.'
15|56|Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Mayotta-sha no soto wa, dare ga omo no o jihi ni zetsubō shimashou ka.'
15|57|Kare wa (mata) itta. ` (Omo no) shito no kata gata yo, anata gata (ga ko rareta tokoro) no yōken wa, nanideshou ka.'
15|58|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni noko wa sa reta.
15|59|(Daga) rūto no ichizoku wa betsudearu. Watashi-tachi wa, kare-ra no zen'in o kanarazu sukuudearou.
15|60|Daga watashi-tachi no kakunin shite iru kare (rūto) no tsuma wa betsu de, ka no on'na wa haigo ni nokoru hitobito no hitoridearu.'
